headline: Lockheed Martin CIO Says AI Is Remaking Her Role
summary: The future of the chief information officer was once in doubt, the role cast as a bureaucrat destined to be replaced by someone, anyone.  The chief digital officer, chief technology officer and chief data officer all had more cachet.  Steve Jobs said the Fortune 500 had “five hundred orifices called CIOs.”

headline: Lockheed Martin: Why The Golden Dome Project Is Now Critical For The Stock
